briefTitle: Studying The Association Between Environmental Exposure to PFAS and Breast Cancer in Assiut Governorate- Egypt
officialTitle: Studying The Association Between Environmental Exposure to Polyfluoroalkyl Substances and Breast Cancer in Assiut Governorate- Egypt
primaryOutcomeMeasure: 1- Measuring serum level of PFAS in breast cancer female patients and healthy participants.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

-

Newly diagnosed cases. Who are diagnosed by ultrasonography and mammography and confirmed diagnosis after biopsy taken for histopathological examination.

Exclusion Criteria:

* 1. Patients who underwent neoadjuvant chemotherapy prior to their surgery will be excluded from the study.

  2.To eliminate confounding factors, breast cancer patients with comorbidities and chronic diseases such as uncontrolled diabetes mellitus or other endocrine disorders, poorly controlled hypertension, acute coronary syndrome, congestive heart failure, chronic kidney disease and chronic liver disease will be excluded.

  3.Women with biopsy-proven benign breast disease should be excluded

  .4. Patients who have other malignancies are excluded

  6. patients with family history of breast cancer will be excluded. 7. Patients refuse to continue the study
